backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition for the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping portfolio features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all portfolio sections inside the main layout with a navbar and toaster.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, fake async submission, and toast feedback.
Layout wrapper adding page structure and a footer with attribution.
Sticky responsive navbar with smooth-scroll navigation and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact form and contact methods including email, LinkedIn, and GitHub.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, intro text, stats, and buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Journey: Shows a scroll-animated career timeline with milestones and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Presents service offerings via ServiceCards and a call‑to‑action button.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorkPro: Wraps and displays the WorkCategoryTabs inside a projects section.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCards.tsx: Grid of interactive service cards with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/TimelineProgress: Scroll-based vertical progress indicator showing milestone completion.
frontend/src/components/WorkCategoryTabs: Renders tabbed website and app category cards with descriptions, counts, and highlights.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/clear functions, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced-motion and updates on media query changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Hook that applies scroll-based reveal animations using IntersectionObserver, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus custom theme variables and scroll‑reveal animation classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, features, image requirements, and current state for the portfolio build.
